originalText.text: I first met Julie Tupler as a guest on my podcast, "Well-Adjusted Mama" and was so impressed with her expertise in a non-surgical approach to healing diastasis recti, I took her professional training program. While going through the training program, I had the opportunity to close my own diastasis and my posture has never looked better.  As a chiropractor, I've integrated this technique into my practice, Hoboken Family Chiropractic + Wellness, witnessing remarkable improvements in my patients. This program is not just about closing diastasis but fostering overall wellness.  Highly recommend!

originalText.text: I'm so thrilled to have crossed the Tupler Technique website when I was looking how to get rid of a diastasis. I did the training and now it's been more than 3 years that I help women in Switzerland thanks to the Tupler Technique. And this year I'm working on the Master Trainee in French. I'm just so convinced about this program and wonder how it hasn't been known earlier here in Switzerland. Very grateful for this opportunity, thanks Julie Tupler.

originalText.text: I purchased one of their program bundles and they immediately began harassing me to buy more add ons. Their programs are expensive to begin with before even sending me what I had purchased, so it was very scammy. I’m not sure what they have going on on the back end but I would recommend looking else where for treatment.

originalText.text: I purchased the product online. Received a couple of emails from them trying to get me to buy more. I declined. Then they called me, twice I think regarding the same thing. Had mystery specials and it was very shady. A very disappointing experience. It was clear they were hustling, nothing more or less.

originalText.text: Solid program for post natal (and anyone else) folks suffering from the inability to get their core to work again. I tried out the brace for 6 weeks along with the exercises and saw fantastic results.
